eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Catastrophe has come. Jieyun pulls out the sword before her Shifu's grave outside the city, bringing a certain plot to fruition. On the tower, Lin YÃ¼hsia sees her father fall to the ground, exhausted in the fight against the Catastrophe, and realizes her duty.

attributes.content: I saw two children fight over a fruit in that blurry mist.
They were about the same age and size, but one was quicker and punched heavier, and he knocked his foe to the ground.
He gets the fruit.
To the victor goes the spoils.
I saw that hunt.
Humanity declared war on Them. Mortals brought down gods that they could not even fathom, at the price of millions of lives.
Victory or death.

attributes.text: What is the meaning of kung fu?
\nStrength? Skill? An instrument of killing?
\nOne man, no matter how strong, can never overcome an entire army or a battleship.
Is assassination and backstabbing a kind of skill? Why pick one's means of killing? Why study it as a school?
\nSearching for an answer before this obstacle, I forsook my power, sealed 'myself' into a sword, and built myself a human body.
How long has it been?
\nHow long has it been since the last time I encountered an opponent against whom I could give my all?

attributes.content: Round 8.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The Grandmaster takes one step back before his opponent's assault. Huai Tianpei's fists are exhausted by the time they reach the Grandmaster's palm.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: (Flexes bones)
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Huff...
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.text: For forty years I have studied kung fu. I have never seen a mountain I could not overcome, never known defeat.
\nMy first shifu told me he had nothing left to teach me after six months.
\nEach subsequent shifu that I studied under sent me away after a year, at most.
There are hundreds of kung fu schools under Heaven, but what use are so many moves, when you only have one pair of hands, one pair of feet?
I will practice my own kung fu.
\nHeavier. Faster. More precise.
But this man before me...

attributes.content: Round 9...
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Huai Tianpei strikes at the Grandmaster's flank, cutting off his retreat.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The Grandmaster stays still and strikes back with equal force, cutting off Huai Tianpei's attack.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.text: The outcome is already clear... who could take nine hits from this man?
If he is a rock, then he is not facing a bigger rock, but a deep pool.
\nA pool with many rocks at its bottom.
How can one defeat Kung Fu itself?
But he is still standing.
Huai Tianpei digs deep into the sand, focusing his mind and breath, breathing out, breathing in.
Then, he holds up his fists again.
Move a mountain to fill a lake. If the pond cannot be filled, it only means that the rock is not big enough.

attributes.content: (Coughs blood)
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I lost.
I lost?
Round... 10.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The Record Keeper's ink brush stops.
He does not know how to record this.
It could not be simpler. Punch, hit, separate. No forms, no variations, just force against force, like two children fighting over food.
The only difference is that they are fighting over victory.
He has never seen Grandmaster wince in pain. Until now.
Wind.
...The Grandmaster has won.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: (Coughs blood)
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Hahaha!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Hahahahaha!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Looks like you weren't concerned with victory or defeat.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: How could I not be?!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: You're the First Under Heaven.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: But all it took was forty years for me to get the upper hand on you, once. Another three hundred and sixty years, and I'll beat you and become First Under Heaven!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: True, you would likely surpass me, if you had another three hundred years.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: But how can a mortal live that long?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It's true that some people have lived three centuries, using Originium Arts to extend their lifespans.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: I doubt that would be possible for Mr. Huai, however.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: You're the First Among Men. No need to wait three hundred years.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Grandmaster... Mr. Huai has fainted.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Take him back to the barracks. Treat his injuries.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: (Cheering)
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: (Bangs on sheathes)
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: Liang Xun, that man is your friend?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Do you think he can be entrusted with the sword?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: In terms of skill and character, there is no other choice.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: What say you, Lord Exorcist?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Zuo Xuanliao says nothing. He gazes at the battlefield below. One lies on the ground, one is standing. The outcome has been decided.
But the soldiers continue to bang their swords on their sheathes, a tradition among Yumen soldiers when they watch a demonstration.
It was a rare sight, a life and death struggle on a great battlefield, under the raging winds and sand.
Even the sickly general feels his heart race.
How many times has he fought alongside him? Has he ever fought so hard against any other foe?
If there is one to whom he can entrust the sword, it should be...
The Catastrophe...
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: It's coming.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I'm back, Shifu.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Jieyun limps towards a small mound by the nomadic city's route.
The grave is new, with a few poplars on each side that she planted to mark the place. Fortunately, it is close to where she thought it would be; the city has not traveled far.
She bows down and places the sword at the grave.
I said I would bring the sword back. I did it.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I went to the forge, saw the blacksmith, and the old pagoda tree.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The city is very different from how I imagined.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Is that a place that can be called 'home?'
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Why are people not afraid to live on a great, moving plate?
They're not afraid that a Catastrophe would destroy their houses, not afraid that they won't have food or water.
I don't understand.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I don't understand the people in the city, or you, who left the city.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I don't understand what kind of person he is.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.text: He is brave, strong, invincible.
He is foolish, pathetic, alienated.
You held his sword. You were close to him.

attributes.content: The voice feels far away. Is someone speaking to her?
She suddenly wants to see what the sword is like.
I'm leaving tomorrow.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The borders have been peaceful lately. Things should be fine even if I'm away for a while.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Such a hurry?
Your condition... and that of some of the others, they can't wait.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Just because there's no doctor who can treat it doesn't mean there's no one in Yan. If there's no one in Yan, perhaps there's another in these vast lands...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I have a brother who may be able to do it.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Take care while I'm away.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You're not a doctor. Why don't you ask what the patient wants?
My days may be numbered, but I want to see other places with the ones I have left.
All I've seen in my years at Yumen is sand as far as the eye could see. I want to travel, while I can still ride a burdenbeast.
To see Shangshu's famous mountains, taste Jiangnan's famous fresh water chestnuts...
With someone, hopefully.
You're sick. You need to stay put...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: What do you know about being sick? You've never been sick or injured, have you?
Not only that, we've known each other for so long, but I've never seen a crease appear on your face.
We're not the same.
I'll be leaving. Don't think too much. Get some rest...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Is this a dream?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.text: She draws the sword.

attributes.content: The ancient sword leaves its sheath.
Its shape is somewhat unusual, but otherwise it is an ordinary sword, not even sharp.
Through the blade, she sees the clouds in the sky, and the shadow of the sun.

attributes.text: So this is how you separated yourself from It.
So obvious it was hardly worth thinking about.
You are the one who became most like Man.

attributes.content: The sliver of the ghost leaves quietly.
He has found the answer.
I must go.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I need to return the sword... and ask him face to face.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Why are you sleeping on the walls, Miss Ling?! A Catastrophe is coming. Get down and get to a shelter.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: Leave this to us.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The Four Guardians have been deployed, as have the sand filters and Originium scrubbers. They are Yumen's first and firmest line of defense.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: Given the size of the cloud formation, however, the Four Guardians will not be able to completely shut the storm out. Dust and Originium particles that get through will form a secondary storm.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: The scale would be equivalent to a small Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: Following the evacuation, all the plates on the east side have been retracted to avoid impact, but the plates of the inner city are immobile and will be impacted by the secondary storm directly.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: How many are you?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The Imperial Astronomical Bureau has twelve casters stationed at Yumen.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: How are you deployed?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Six here, six in the inner city.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: Are six enough to protect the inner city?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The Lord Exorcist has deemed both locations critical.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: The Imperial Astronomical Bureau will do its best.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: Go to the inner city. Leave this place to me.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The danger is the same. Go.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Last time I saw a scene like this was decades ago, when I first came to Shangshu.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Yumen doesn't have brews as refined as Husong and Guixing, but Liedaozi is good stuff. Heavens, look at the scene you're treating me to.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: A toast to you too, Heaven.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Ack, there's no goblet for me to throw right now.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: A crack of thunder, so close it makes everyone's heart skip a beat.
The dark clouds are above the city in an instant.
Thick masses of air pull the sky down, while the darting arc lightning looks almost alive.
Raindrops evaporate the moment they form. The air is so dry that the slightest contact could set something on fire.
Yumen serves as the flint.
A single sight as far as the eye could see. How overwhelming, how terrible, how magnificent!
Come!
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The lantern lights. The poet stands up, and drinks her fill from her flask.
The sandstorm and thunder rage, as earth and heaven become one stage.
Throw a goblet to the setting sun, toast the tower with sand overrun.
All of Heaven and earth, in the flask.
Increasing output.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: Keep it up! The dams must run at maximum power.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: The sand sluices have never been asked to churn so much sand, even with Yumen at full speed. With the city stationary right now, running the sluice dams at full power without the normal offloads would result in very high wear...
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: No time to think about that!
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: If all the sand and Originium dust that the Wind Aegis block piles up in front, it's going to swallow Yumen's foundation, jamming the whole city.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: Maybe you should worry about yourself right now.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: What the?!
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: The sky is unrecognizable.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Mr. Jing? Why are you here? Everyone should have evacuated to the west side.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: I came back.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Those Shanhaizhong wangbadan are using the chaos to sabotage our Catastrophe defenses and harass the people. We caught them in the act a few times.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: That's a job for the Patrol Battalion.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Can the Patrol Battalion deal with the Catastrophe and the Shanhaizhong at the same time?
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Why do we carry swords, if all we do is hide at a time like this?
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Hey, I help.
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: You're a tourist. There's no need to...
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Yan saying, repay drop of water with river.
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: You buy me many drink. I repay.
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: I like your spirit. Alright, hop on.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: What's most important to Zuo Xuanliao? Protecting Yumen.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Catch.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Freshly brewed Liedaozi! The old man said to give you guys a treat.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Mr. Meng was...
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: No need for any of that.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: All we need to know is that he died at the hands of these wangbadan.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Pah, these Yumenites didn't forget to take all their valuables, even when they're fleeing for their lives.
attributes.name: Greedy Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: But there are a few jewelry shops on this street. They can't very well have taken all of it...
attributes.name: Greedy Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: You just can't pass up a little looting, can you?
attributes.name: Cold Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: The other team has gone to close the sand sluices. Don't forget the mission.
attributes.name: Cold Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: I would never.
attributes.name: Greedy Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: But they're ready for us.
attributes.name: Greedy Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: A bunch of ruffians who haven't had a real fight in twenty years, satisfying themselves with fighting in the ring for show.
attributes.name: Cold Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Useless rabble.
attributes.name: Cold Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Here they come.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: An impressive-sounding name won't change the fact that they're just a bunch of thieves and bandits.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Useless rabble.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: They're spreading out and trying to cause as much chaos as possible. Don't let them get away!
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: I need a group to cut off Kangqing Street! It leads to the west side where the civilians are!
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: I go!
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: We'll have a drink and kill some bad guys.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Why does the trip back feel so far...?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The wind and sand are getting...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Found you... good thing your footprints weren't completely wiped away.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You weren't lying about planning to come back to Yumen.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Why are you here?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: To get the sword back.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: And to make sure you're safe.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Why are you hurt as well?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: No time to talk about that. We need to get back to the city!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You were lucky to survive the jump down the sand sluice. Your injuries will take a long time to heal, though.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Here, hold on to me.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I must be seeing things. There couldn't be anyone else out here at a time like this.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Yumen has come to a full stop, slightly off the expected location.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: The Catastrophe has reached the eastern side of Yumen. Unable to hail Lord Wei at this time.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.content: We're climbing.
attributes.name: Shadow Guard

attributes.text: Though the path may sever, let not thy spirit falter.
Spring chill presses armor, autumn frost dapples Yumen's barrier.
That long dream, laments ere and now.

attributes.content: Just look at Miss Ling.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: The excitement is rubbing off on this rat.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: They want to close the sand sluices.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: They know how important it is right now... do the Shanhaizhong have people with engineering expertise?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier B

attributes.content: (Sneers)
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: You can jump now, or I can throw your corpses down after I kill you.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Miss Qiu?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier A

attributes.content: I heard Zuo Le came here, so I thought I would help out as well. Looks like I came at the right time.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Shanhaizhong once sent an invitation to the river fort of Jiangqi, but we didn't get a response.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: How ironic that you've chosen to take the side of the Yanese army.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: You're well-informed.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Of course. We pay attention to those who walk our path.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Cut the crap.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Have you forgotten that you came to Yumen for revenge?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Good question. Unfortunately, I've already found the answer.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: She raises her sword again.
This time, there is no need for her to pull back.
The man from Sargon swings at the Shanhaizhong member trying to attack the soldiers, forcing him back.
His Yanese is mediocre, but his attack is clean, powerful, pragmatic.
Nice!
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: So you weren't exaggerating back at the inn. You've got a couple of tricks up your sleeve.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: No couple of trick, only one trick.
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: Grandmaster taught me when he came Sargon, but only one move...
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: They're still not backing off, even after losing so many. Are they not afraid to die?
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: What happen?
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: It's the sound of the storm impacting the Wind Aegis. Be careful.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: This is a bigger Catastrophe than any Yumen has encountered before.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: I don't even want to think about the Imperial Astronomical Bureau Casters who are taking the full brunt of it.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: The Catastrophe is raging. They have their hands full dealing with it. Don't waste time here.
attributes.name: Cold Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Take these ones out and retreat to the evacuation shelters on the west side.
attributes.name: Cold Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Gotcha.
attributes.name: Greedy Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Where do you think you're going? We knew you were coming this way.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Round them up!
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: We'll leave the Catastrophe to the Imperial Astronomical Bureau Casters. These wangbadan are ours!
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: The sky has broken. Gravel and rock beyond reckoning clash, roll and rub against each other in the maelstrom, screeching like metal on metal.
The storm bears down on the tower, then hits a wall of Arts.
Hold your ground!
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: Form up!
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: That's the secondary storm after it passes through the Wind Aegis?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Mr. Lin! What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: Lending a hand.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: We can handle this. You should go back.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: To where? How am I supposed to get my afternoon nap when there's a commotion like this out here?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: The Originium scrubbers in the inner city can stop the particles from spreading, but the impact of the storm itself must be met with Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: One more warm body.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Lin steps forward.
He has already taken off his coat.
I've manipulated sand for decades. I might as well find a coffin to sleep in now, if I can't make myself useful at a time like this.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Or are my little tricks just a burden to the great Tianshis?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: ...Just be careful, sir.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: Make way for Mr. Lin!
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Dad! I've been looking for you...
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Perfect timing, YÃ¼hsia.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: You're hurt!
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Will that get in the way of anything?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Watch. You still have much to learn when it comes to Arts.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: The storm converges again in mid-air and approaches once again. Dirt and rocks spin chaotically on the outer edge, while the air has been so compressed at the center that sparks are flying.
The heavens roar, then silence.
A wall of sand rises, filling every gap in the wall of Arts, pushing it slowly but steadily forward. One meter, three meters... ten meters.
Lin stands at the center of the casters, a great tree that budges for no storm.
I've never seen Arts like this before...
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: To achieve such stability over such a large area...
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: It's coming again!
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Lin YÃ¼hsia has never seen the full extent of her father's Arts. It has never been needed for his enemies.
The shadow of Lungmen leads a regular life.
Taking 'walks' through the streets, enjoying a bowl of finball soup, visiting people, living and dead.
Most of the time, he is smiling, nonchalant. There are few things that make him bare his fangs.
He looks much smaller without his coat. YÃ¼hsia can see his arms begin to tremble, like thin branches that could be broken by a stiff wind at any time.
Help Mr. Lin down.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: He has taken the brunt of four waves of Originium storms. He can take no more.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: (Coughs blood)
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Dad!
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: *pant*...
*pant*...
'I just hope this will be resolved quickly without delaying your trip to Victoria.'
'It's not your own choice if you haven't seen another path.'
Those are the kind of things that Dad always said.
Lin YÃ¼hsia did not want her father to set her path. Perhaps she has not made a decision yet.
But Dad is already old. He was not joking when he talked about retiring.
When the old fall, it is time for the young to take their place.
The logic is illogical, yet immovable.
YÃ¼hsia steps forward and takes her father's place, shielding him behind her.
Miss Lin...
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Caster

attributes.content: Don't speak. You're all injured. Adjust your breathing.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Here it comes.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Keep your eyes forward!
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia
